resources.string: RTEMS
Name cannot contain digits or special characters
Name must contain maximum 30 characters
Name must contain minimum 1 character
User name cannot contain digits or special characters
User name must contain maximum 30 characters
User name must contain minimum 1 character
Password must contain maximum 30 characters
Password must contain minimum 4 characters
Password must contain at least one lower-case
Password must contain at least one upper-case
Password must contain at least one digits
Password must contain at least one special character
Enter Valid Age
Enter Valid Phone Number
Phone Number must contain maximum 10 digits
Phone Number must contain minimum 10 digits
sleep
terminate
sms service
